Worcester... hmm

This city is just about what I expected. It's a bit like Manchester, but not quite as friendly. My new place is nice though. It's roomy.

I'm picking out a new camera this week. I picked out a camera: the Canon Digital Rebel XT! My old digital camera was pilfered when our place in Boston was broken into. I still have my old Canon EOS Rebel 35mm and an old Kodak Polariod camera , but you know the story with film processing/printing these days. $$$

Anyways, expect lots of Worcester photos shortly. The camera is on its way.
